summary: MY WIFE WAS DRIVING DOWN A BUSY FOUR LANE HIGHWAY AT 45 MPH WHEN THE AIRBAGS DEPLOYED FOR NO REASON.  SHE RECEIVED FIRST AND SECOND DEGREE BURNS TO HER RIGHT HAND FROM THE CHEMICALS IN THE AIRBAG.  SHE WAS ABLE TO KEEP CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  TOYOTA HAS BEEN NOTIFIED VIA E-MAIL, NO RESPONSE.    *NLM
